snippet.title: Sparkle 4 Tales - Xbox One Gameplay
snippet.description:
Begin the emotional journey and start as a small spark of life. Move out of the depths into the bright and peaceful place of grown species.Immerse yourself in the atmospheric surroundings from the beginnings of life, and the beautiful soundtrack to complement your experience. Find and absorb elements to progress further into your evolutionary story.

Have a conversation with the Creator to determine your future. Will you grow into a peaceful being, a bloodthirsty carnivore or something in between? Explore the Void and find your destiny. Become a magnificent being and discover your potential in a unique story.

Developed by MMEU
Published by Forever Entertainment
Also released on PC, PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch

#xbox #xboxone #indiegames #idatxbox #theforeseenarcade #sparkle #sparkle4 #sparkle4tales #foreverentertainment
